players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Alice was killed, so she was town. Diana or Bob must be the mafia. I'm leaning towards voting for Diana today."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's town. Bob must be the mafia trying to frame me."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and investigated him - he is mafia. Diana, trust me and vote Charlie with me to win."

Diana: "I think Charlie is lying because he can't be the detective, if he was investigating me last night and told you so. Plus, Bob's story is suspiciously convenient. I don't want to vote him out yet."
